note:
PDX-based bibliophile, writer, photographer, and liminal shade. I'm queer, trans, nonbinary, neurospicy, and poly. A memento mori magpie surrounded by a septet of cats.

I'm also the creator and narrator of the #LiminalFlares podcast: Haunted and haunting bedtime stories from beyond & in-between. Eldritch pieces of public domain literature amended to be gender-inclusive. Audio witchery by @theremina

Header: b/w illus of cobwebbed, betentacled bookshelves w/ the Liminal Flares logo
